entry.title: test
entry.content:
文献引用：引用的部分顺下去的

李晗曦. 视频中敏感信息识别技术研究与实现[D]. 中国科学院大学(中国科学院沈阳计算技术研究所), 2021. DOI:10.27587/d.cnki.gksjs.2021.000033

窦井苒. 面向互联网敏感内容检测方法的研究[D]. 西安电子科技大学, 2022. DOI:10.27389/d.cnki.gxadu.2022.000921

汤会枫,俞鸿权,张建龙等. 基于自然语言处理的主动式敏感信息检测系统 [J]. 电脑编程技巧与维护, 2021, (09): 120-123. DOI:10.16184/j.cnki.comprg.2021.09.046

薛朋强,努尔布力,吾守尔·斯拉木. 基于网络文本信息的敏感信息过滤算法 [J]. 计算机工程与设计, 2016, 37 (09): 2447-2452. DOI:10.16208/j.issn1000-7024.2016.09.030

Chong P. Deep Learning Based Sensitive Data Detection[C]//2022 19th International Computer Conference on Wavelet Active Media Technology and Information Processing (ICCWAMTIP). IEEE, 2022: 1-6.

黄诚,赵倩锐. 基于语言模型词嵌入和注意力机制的敏感信息检测方法 [J]. 计算机应用, 2022, 42 (07): 2009-2014.

邓伟,许放,张涛,等. 基于DBN模型的互联网敏感信息泄露检测研究 [J]. 电子设计工程, 2024, 32 (05): 174-177+182. DOI:10.14022/j.issn1674-6236.2024.05.036.

路松峰,郑召作,周军龙,等. 融合变体字还原和语义分析的敏感信息检测 [J]. 湖北大学学报(自然科学版), 2023, 45 (06): 879-887.

黄云飞. 基于多模态特征融合的敏感信息检测研究与应用[D]. 电子科技大学, 2023. DOI:10.27005/d.cnki.gdzku.2023.003247.

Fu Y, Yu Y, Wu X. A sensitive word detection method based on variants recognition[C]//2019 International Conference on Machine Learning, Big Data and Business Intelligence (MLBDBI). IEEE, 2019: 47-52.

Hong Q, Zheng T, Wenli L, et al. A sensitive information detection method based on network traffic restore[C]//2020 12th International Conference on Measuring Technology and Mechatronics Automation (ICMTMA). IEEE, 2020: 832-836.

Liu Y, Yang C Y, Yang J. A Graph Convolutional Network-Based Sensitive Information Detection Algorithm[J]. Complexity, 2021, 2021: 1-8.

Guo R, Li W, Wang H, et al. A Multi-Information Detection Model for Violent Images based on YOLOv3-SPP and DenseNet[C]//2022 11th International Conference of Information and Communication Technology (ICTech)). IEEE, 2022: 529-532.

Chong P. Deep Learning Based Sensitive Data Detection[C]//2022 19th International Computer Conference on Wavelet Active Media Technology and Information Processing (ICCWAMTIP). IEEE, 2022: 1-6.（重复的）

Wang S, Huang L, Wang Z, et al. Deep Learning Based Fusion Models for Sensitive Information Identification[C]//2023 IEEE 6th Information Technology, Networking, Electronic and Automation Control Conference (ITNEC). IEEE, 2023, 6: 1478-1482.

Gambarelli G, Gangemi A, Tripodi R. Is your model sensitive? SPEDAC: A New resource for the automatic classification of sensitive personal data[J]. IEEE Access, 2023, 11: 10864-10880.

谢鑫. 基于深度学习的不良信息检测技术的研究[D]. 电子科技大学, 2020. DOI:10.27005/d.cnki.gdzku.2020.001260

Bengio, Y., Ducharme, R., & Vincent, P. (2000). A neural probabilistic language model. Advances in neural information processing systems, 13.

Mikolov, T., Sutskever, I., Chen, K., Corrado, G. S., & Dean, J. (2013). Distributed representations of words and phrases and their compositionality. Advances in neural information processing systems, 26.

Pennington, J., Socher, R., & Manning, C. D. (2014, October). Glove: Global vectors for word representation. In Proceedings of the 2014 conference on empirical methods in natural language processing (EMNLP) (pp. 1532-1543).

Bojanowski, P., Grave, E., Joulin, A., & Mikolov, T. (2017). Enriching word vectors with subword information. Transactions of the association for computational linguistics, 5, 135-146.

Viterbi, A. (1967). Error bounds for convolutional codes and an asymptotically optimum decoding algorithm. IEEE transactions on Information Theory, 13(2), 260-269.
